title: League launcher not launching client
body:
Hi everybody, Since the Ivern patch my league of legends launcher will only open and update - but upon clicking 'launch' to log in and open the rest of the client; it ends the task without warning. - Currently, I've uninstalled/reinstalled it - disabled any virus software and firewall that may be preventing it from launching; updated my Nvidia drivers and I've tried different window compatibility modes. I've also of course have been trying to run it as admin. Furthermore, I have checked both java and flash player - both are up to date.
Does anyone else have this issue, a solution or suggestion? Any and all help will be greatly appreciated.
Thanks for your time :)

replies.body:
This often happens if your connection drops off before reaching the login servers. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Qb1XVBNQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-14T04:40:46.583+0000)
>
> This often happens if your connection drops off before reaching the login servers. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
> 
> Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Thanks Targon - I used your guide to browse some more and try more options. However I wasn't able to figure out the issue. Hopefully the information I've gathered from the guides will help with the ticket I submit. Thanks again!
